Description: Stolen or guessed credentials used to access PHI
Mitigation: Enforce MFA and SSO; anomaly detection; least privilege

Description: Malware encrypts production systems and backups
Mitigation: Immutable backups; EDR; phishing training; tabletop exercises

Threat: Data loss due to cloud misconfiguration
Mitigation: Automated cloud config scanning and guardrails
BAA; vendor assessments; data minimization; logging
Centralized logging; retention policy; access reviews
